attributes.action: consider  bringing in tougher penalties for crimes committed against children and police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Persons who commit crimes against children should if found guilty spend a minimum of 18 years in prison and those found guilty of murder/manslaughter of children they should be given life with no parole and no release from prison. There should also be more done to protect our police by the courts of this land by giving out longer sentences to those who insult, assualt and even murder our police, it is time the government started to listen to the people of this country of what they want, and less heed to the do-gooders.
